title: Keeping my hands busy
author: Jessica Sydney Fairlie
body: When I feel overwhelmed contemplating issues in life, especially the environment, I self soothe by keeping my hands busy. This is the sweater thatâ€™s been keeping me sane for the last several weeks, and I am very proud of how it turned out. Knitting a sweater is so much more about the process than the result itself, and I would like to carry that mentality forward when approaching difficult to answer questions.
category: where do we go from here
